main event: On May 13, 1965, a civilian reported sighting a reddish light in Storm Lake, Iowa, that flickered and emitted a buzzing sound.
interesting points: The object was described as appearing brighter than a bright star and was estimated to be moving at approximately 600 mph,The object was observed for 1-2 minutes and was noted to have a high-pitched sound, the object flickered and had a reddish hue, The sighting occurred on a cloudy night with dull moonlight, an account from a 12-year-old boy indicated prior interest in UFOs sparked by a classmate's report.
witness description: 12 years old, male, with a brother and girlfriend present during the sighting
